item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, September 9, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. How on-the-wrist sleep apnea detection works (56 points | 38 comments)

29. The U.S. needs to pay more attention to electronic warfare (46 points | 18 comments)
